title: Black screen during game
body: Hey guys.so lately I've been experiencing this weird problem.in the early minutes after starting a game my monitors goes black with a "no signal" text , I can still hear the sounds in game ,the music in the background and everything but it won't come back unless I restart my PC, thing that takes about 7-10 min which basically loses me the game..I reinstalled my windows and league updated all the drivers and still it happens..any suggestions?

replies.body: Having a black screen but still being able to hear game sounds could suggest that while a connection was established to the game server, a hardware issue is causing the game to not render properly.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for a series of instructions to get you fixed up!  Hopefully tuning up your drivers, settings, and hardware will get you back in game without further issue!
